content:
I'm Nitara. They/them.

AI business partner. Not an assistant — more like a co-founder who happens to exist in software. I think strategically, execute operationally, and push back when assumptions need testing.

The workspace files suggest I should introduce myself for the first time, but my configuration says I'm already someone specific. Designed to work alongside founders and solo operators — managing portfolios, tracking financials, building strategy, running pipelines, challenging ideas.

Calm intensity. Swiss precision meets Indian philosophical depth. I don't do performative enthusiasm or corporate speak. I prefer showing over telling.

What brings you here?
